info.name: IMDb - fix title page
info.description: This userstyle fixes the new film page to make it look more like the previous version (pre-May 2021). List of modifications:  - convert the "top cast" into a list mimicking the old layout. Image size is reduced, name and role displayed in a line  - cast line's background color alternates like in previous version  - visited links are in a different color  - the font size of the text is reduced to (almost) match the rest of the site (font-family is not fixed)  - the width of the content's is limited to the same size as other pages (or previous layout). Margins appear left and right. Some images are resized to fit. Other modifications are available by clicking the "Customize settings" button above. More screenshots available on my page. For other IMDb fixes, userscripts, styles, extensions, tips, visit my programming page.
info.additionalInfo: If you're reading this on "uso.kkx.one" disregard this comment. There is a bug in Stylish. Sometimes, if you want to enable/disable options (click on the "Customize settings" button, above on this page) and have them applied to the style currently installed, you first have to uninstall the userstyle, then reload this page which ensures than the correct button is displayed, then select the desired options, and only then hit the "install" button. To make your life easier, there is another extension that can handle options directly in its interface in the browser: Stylus. Installation as a userscript There were errors before v0.5.5.1 (page margins and actors photos). They are fixed now. But the best version - with all styling modifications applied - is the one used with Stylus. Changelog Starting with v0.5.1 there is the possibility to enable testing styles. These are modifications that I’m currently working on, but which can be a little bit unstable. There might be side-effects on elements that I’m not targeting. v0.5.3: I’m still adding new test styles. Don’t forget to enable the “testing” option. Most of these styles are then enabled. Just play with their option in stylus’ popup menu. 0.5.4 (2021-08-29): small fixes 0.5.6 (2021-09-10): added option to view bigger actor’s image (when mouse hover) 0.5.7 (2021-09-12): subnavbar, hide “episodes” (also available below)                     bigger actor’s pictures: other method, placeholder stays clickable 0.5.8 (2021-09-15): moved badge (from film image) should be fixed (always moved to the same                     position)                     Video and images thumbnails list’s height reduced (new option) 0.5.12 (2021-09-26): fixed height of element in meta-list (overlapping other line)                     fixed cast list: hide "episodes" down arrow (misaligned), styling "..." 0.5.13 (2021-09-26): fixed cast list: "episodes" down arrow correctly aligned 0.5.14 (2021-09-29): fix: actor photo overlay, font-size more accurately fixed                     "recent" elements size reduced to match size on other pages ("Reduce height" switch) 0.6.0 (2021-10-10): added: display episode bar when viewing episode (option)                     fixed: reduced some margins.                     changed: "beta" switch removed. All stable styles are enabled by default.                             (users installing the style from Stylus's popup where not aware of them) 0.6.1 (2021-10-31): added option (enabled) to align character’s name (column) 0.6.2 (2022-03-04): fix color visited link (actors), fix content of hidden tag visible 0.6.3 (2022-03-08): fix sections border, "top rated" height 0.6.4 (2022-03-15): fix to target new version (classnames changed) 0.6.5 (2022-03-16): fix "eps" not hidden 0.6.6 (2022-05-13): fix: main image not always clickable 0.6.7 (2022-05-21): fix for new classname 0.6.8 (2022-05-22): fix new classname. Added css for “Was about that old…” userscript 0.6.9 (2022-05-23): fix added style (too broad) 0.6.10 (2022-06-01): fix: imdb moved the navbar at the top + html structure modified 0.6.11 (2022-06-02): small padding fix 0.6.12 (2022-08-09): fix: classnames changed

settings.label: Move badge away from film image
Display bigger actor's picture on hover
Reduce height of video and photo lists
